ing: 1/4 cup white sugar, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "No fuss, no muss with this easiest coleslaw ever."
ins: Place coleslaw mix in a large bowl. Combine mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar, onion powder, salt, and pepper in a small bowl. Pour mayonnaise mixture over coleslaw mix and toss to coat. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes; serve with a slotted spoon.
